# referenceObject

**Instance Property**

The detected object referenced by the object anchor.

## Declaration

```swift
var referenceObject: ARReferenceObject { get }
```

## Discussion

This object is always one of the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARReferenceObject] objects you provided in the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldTrackingConfiguration/detectionObjects] array when configuring the session.
title: referenceObject
